etymology.description: 毛泽东 (Mao Zedong) + 思想 (thought; ideology) = Mao Zedong Thought.
etymology.interpretation: Names the ideological system attributed to Mao Zedong, foundational in PRC political discourse. Often appears in formulations such as “马克思列宁主义、毛泽东思想”.
etymology.simplification: Proper-name characters were simplified in PRC orthography: 澤→泽, 東→东; 思想 unchanged. The simplifications reduce stroke count and standardize writing; traditional form 毛澤東思想 remains in Taiwan/HK.

examples.chinese: 毛泽东思想对中国政治产生了深远影响(毛澤東思想對中國政治產生了深遠影響)。
examples.pinyin: Máo Zédōng Sīxiǎng duì Zhōngguó zhèngzhì chǎnshēng le shēnyuǎn yǐngxiǎng.
examples.english: Mao Zedong Thought has had a profound impact on Chinese politics.

examples.chinese: 许多课程讨论毛泽东思想的历史地位(許多課程討論毛澤東思想的歷史地位)。
examples.pinyin: Xǔduō kèchéng tǎolùn Máo Zédōng Sīxiǎng de lìshǐ dìwèi.
examples.english: Many courses discuss the historical status of Mao Zedong Thought.

examples.chinese: 这本书系统阐述了毛泽东思想(這本書系統闡述了毛澤東思想)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè běn shū xìtǒng chǎnshù le Máo Zédōng Sīxiǎng.
examples.english: This book systematically expounds Mao Zedong Thought.
